text: Teachers are fun, engaging, caring and inspiring. The school has a warm family vibe and their focus is on enjoyment of learning. Many leadership opportunities were carefully created for the students. My child truly enjoys learning in this school. The school has an interesting jazzy school bell music for dismissal which brings a smile to the face.

Fantastic teachers, principal, admin and management. Teachers are very committed and concerned about every child's well-being (especially during HBL). My son loves school and always come home and share with me what he has learnt. Teachers are caring and teaches concepts very well. There are sufficient practices for grammar, chinese pinyin as well as math practice worksheets. I have noticed my son becoming more disciplined in completing daily tasks and takes pride in doing his work. Thank you to all the teachers of 1 Armstrong!!

The newest primary school in punggol (apart from valour primary school), it has a very smooth curve design for the exterior and there is a huge field at the top of the school that reminds me of st. Hildaâ€™s secondary school which also has a field at the top of their school. The teachers here are quite nice .It is conveniently situated close to northshore plaza I and II  and many HDB blocks and the punggol settlement.
This primary school is the best! Its pretty, the learning is excellent and the teachers are fun! There are no bully's and everyone gets along well!

it was raining heavily but cars not allowed to turn into the kindergarten roundabout to pick up. cars have to turn to other side and walk a distance at the dame jamming the road with other cars.
security guard could be trained to allow vehicles to turn to the round about for prinary school on the right and kindergarten on the left
